mainframe.communication

Interface IStationsController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StationsController, StationsControllerStub, StationsControllerStub, StationsControllerStub

    public interface IStationsController
    Handler of all "communication" between mainframe and voting stations
    Author:
    Ophir De Jager

      • gatherVotesFromVotingStations

        IPartiesList gatherVotesFromVotingStations()
        This method should perform the hot backup routine. I.e. it should go over all voting stations and receive their parties lists. Then it should create a parties list that is the merge of all these lists and save that to the local parties list (not just change the reference) by using the joinLists method of IPartyList.

      • checkParties

        boolean checkParties(IPartiesList partiesList)
        Check that parties lists in all stations have the same parties as in the given list.
        Parameters:
        partiesList -

      • checkInit

        boolean checkInit()
        Check that all the station are connected and initialized.
        Returns:
        true if they are connected and initialized, false otherwise.
